text: Michel Lejeune (born August 21, 1946) is a French politician, a member of the National Assembly. He represents the Seine-Maritime department, and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sarthe Category:Politicians from Pays de la Loire Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Michel Lejeune (politician)
